New Expressiveness with MIDI

29 Mar 2015

It seems like there are a lot of interesting ideas out there for new instrument designs.  The LinnStrument features a touchscreen interface and enables subtle finger movements to control pitch, velocity, and timbre.

[embed]https://youtu.be/hGVaOpMODyg[/embed]

The Seaboard has a strange aesthetic and the interface seems more like an organic membrane than keyboard.

https://youtu.be/hP-Tzq3hFgQ

And below is the innovative Instrument 1 from Artiphon, with its more guitar centric design.  There’s still some time to head over to Kickstarter and be a backer.

https://youtu.be/Dn4B1OSDqJs
